content:
The Firebase Admin Java SDK is published to the Maven central repository.
To install the library, declare it as a dependency in your build.gradle file: dependencies
{
implementation
'
com
.
google
.
firebase
:
firebase
-
admin
:
9.4.3
'
} If you use Maven to build your application, you can add the following
dependency to your pom.xml : <
dependency
>
<
groupId>com
.
google
.
firebase
<
/
groupId
>
<
artifactId>firebase
-
admin
<
/
artifactId
>
<
version>9
.4.3
<
/
version
>
<
/
dependency
>
